type
クラス TypeConstraintsInferer

java.lang.Object
  type.TypeConstraintsInferer

public class TypeConstraintsInferer
extends Object

This class infers type constrains from COMPILE STRUCTURE

2006/06/03 (Sat.)
作成者:
kudo

updateFreeLinks

private Set updateFreeLinks(LinkOccurrence lo,
                            Set freelinks)
if $lo's buddy is in $freelinks, add an inversion constraint. Else, add $lo into $freelinks.

パラメータ:
lo -
freelinks - Set of free links already checked
戻り値:
updated Set

addConstraintAboutLinks

private void addConstraintAboutLinks(int sign,
                                     LinkOccurrence lo,
                                     LinkOccurrence b)
If $lo or $b is output-argument, add receive-passive-constraint. Else, add unify-constraint.

lo -
